scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.dev:admin: concurrently -n server,admin -c blue,yellow "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w admin-client"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n server,client,admin -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client" "npm run dev -w admin-client"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../admin-client && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p .vercel/output/static && cp -r client/dist/* .vercel/output/static/ && mkdir -p .vercel/output/static/admin && cp -r admin-client/dist/* .vercel/output/static/admin/ && echo '{"version":3}' > .vercel/output/config.json && cd server && npm run vercel-build && cd ..
